trans-unit.source: Models a Category, which consists of a localized name and a collection of properties.
trans-unit.target: A modellek egy kategóriát, amely honosított nevét és tulajdonságainak gyűjteményét tartalmazza.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Létrehoz egy új példányt a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The localized Category name of a group of properties.
trans-unit.target: Egy csoport tulajdonságainak honosított kategória neve.

trans-unit.source: name is .
Sets a new property filter.
If the Category matches the specified filter, then the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry.FilterApplied> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Ha a kategória sem felel meg a megadott szűrő, akkor a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry.FilterApplied>egy esemény jelenik meg.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry.FilterApplied>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"></xref> being applied.
Gets the name of the localized Category.
The localized Category name.
Declares the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"></xref> event.
To be added.
Returns a property instance of this [System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) object given the property name.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság példányát adja vissza [System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) tulajdonság neve a objektum.

trans-unit.source: The string property name for which to return a property instance.
trans-unit.target: A karakterlánc tulajdonság neve, amelynek egy tulajdonság példány visszaadása.

trans-unit.source: The property corresponding to the property name parameter if one exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A megfelelő a tulajdonság-name paramétert, ha egy tulajdonság létezik; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry"></xref> matches a filter.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdez vagy beállít egy értéket, amely jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry"> </xref> megfelel a szűrőnek.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a filter equals the specified filter; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a szűrőt a megadott szűrő; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether an <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"></xref> matches a predicate.
trans-unit.target: Azt jelzi, hogy egy <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"> </xref> predikátum megegyezik.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilterPredicate"></xref>, a string, to match against.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there is a match; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha van egyezés; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry.FilterApplied"></xref> event when the property filter is applied.
trans-unit.target: Kiváltja a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry.FilterApplied"> </xref> eseményt, ha a tulajdonság szűrő.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"></xref> being applied.
Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry.PropertyChanged"></xref> event.
The name of the property that is changed.
propertyName is .
Gets an [Systems.Collections.IEnumerable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) collection of all of the properties in the category.
An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>, a collection of all the properties in the category.
trans-unit.target: Egy <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>, a kategóriában található összes tulajdonság gyűjteménye.

trans-unit.source: Declares the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Design.PropertyEditing.INotifyPropertyChanged> event.
To be added.
